Keywords: Past , Ruler , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Jessica Drew
Special Powers
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Ruler keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!: When Spider-Pharaoh hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
CARRY MY ARMIES TO BATTLE: Phasing/Teleport, Passenger: 3.
QUEEN OF ALL THAT LIGHT TOUCHES: Empower, Enhancement, Leadership, Probability Control.
